Reviews.Title: nice windows phone
Reviews.Author: That™ Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: wanted a windows phone to experiment with... something not too costly, just in case i do not like Windows mobile (i am an android user)...the phone works really good for its specs, and the battery life is unbelievable... can get up to 3 days on a single charge...it is not that fast but it is worth the price

Reviews.Title: the item does not  work as I expected
Reviews.Author: steven loria
Reviews.Content: I had some problems with the item, with the text messages also the Bluetooth doesn't work properly, I ask for a refund for the article.

Reviews.Title: Will not send pictures
Reviews.Author: P. W. Lazenby
Reviews.Content: The Nokia Lumia 610 will not send pictures and the phone will not let you manually adjust the MMS settings.  When troubleshooting I was told to download the Network app from the Nokia Marketplace but the app is not there.  And there are no other options for the MMS.  The Samsung Windows phone is much easier to use.  DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE.  It was a Christmas present and that is VERY disappointing.  I will be using it for a paper weight.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: Sarax
Reviews.Content: I returned this item because I ordered the wrong one (I was unaware of the size of SIM card required) and I truly was excited when I received a nice brand new box for this phone. Of course, I couldn't open it, but since it was packaged firmly I believe the phone would have been in perfect condition. They were courteous and allowed me to return it for a full refund. I will be happy to order the correct phone from them when I get the chance!
